adrFormatAddress: 429 E 75th St 5th Floor, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the privilege of being treated by Dr. Daniel I. Richman at HSS for a cervical epidural steroid injection at the C5 and C6 levels. From the moment I walked into the clinic, I felt like I was in the best hands possible.

Dr. Richman is not just a physician; he’s an extraordinary caregiver. He took the time to thoroughly explain the procedure, what I could expect during recovery, and how it would improve my condition. His expertise was evident, and his reassuring demeanor alleviated any anxieties I had.

The procedure itself was performed with the utmost precision and care, and I’m pleased to report that the results have been extremely positive. I felt minimal discomfort, and the relief I’ve experienced has been nothing short of remarkable.

Moreover, Dr. Richman’s support staff deserves high praise. They were professional, attentive, and incredibly accommodating, making the entire experience smooth from start to finish.

If you’re in need of spine care, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Daniel I. Richman at HSS. His exceptional skill and compassionate approach make him stand head and shoulders above the rest.

originalText.text: Dr. Richman is hands down one of the best docs at HSS. Being part of pain management, he is able to tackle complicated cases and help relieve pain so I am able to continue with my everyday life. He is very knowledgeable, will listen to my questions and concerns.

originalText.text:
Dan Richman is a fake and a fraud.
He was not able to identify my problem, didn't help me with my back pain, doesn't know how to deal with origins of pain management, indifferent, a greedy con artist. Unethical, lies to make himself right. PLEASE do yourself a favor. PLEASE STAY AWAY! Talk about unethical and fraud. Just mind blowing he is not in jail.

Choosing him for my prognosis, medical care & management was the worst decision of my life. He messed up my diagnosis, did not listen, mis diagnosed the MRI's and X-Rays and I am living in constant pain. Nothing can be done to correct what he did. Awful Awful Awful Awful!!!

originalText.text: Dr. Dan Richman is a fantastic physician. He has treated my back pain for over 8 years and has not once let me down. Couldn't have asked for better. Thanks doctor!

originalText.text: Very unethical, and in my opinion and based on my observations, he is very inept when it comes to dealing with patients. His clinical diagnosis has been completely wrong on many occasions and has caused me more pain and anguish than anything else. I am not sure how he is part of HSS. Please stay away for your own good.
